title: Michael Zezas: COVID-19 Sparks Renewed U.S.-China Trade Tensions
description: Can the Phase One trade deal détente stand, or will the U.S. and China return to a cycle of escalating tariffs that may impact prospects of a rebound in economic growth? Michael Zezas, Head of Public Policy Research and Municipal Strategy, takes a closer look.
itunes:title: Michael Zezas: COVID-19 Sparks Renewed U.S.-China Trade Tensions
itunes:summary: Can the Phase One trade deal détente stand, or will the U.S. and China return to a cycle of escalating tariffs that may impact prospects of a rebound in economic growth? Michael Zezas, Head of Public Policy Research and Municipal Strategy, takes a closer look.
